description: Try our easy to follow Fish Fillet Sliders recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Slider,Pescatarian,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Fish,Soy free,Sweet potato,Tomato,Fish burger,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Fish Fillet Sliders Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium sweet potato, sliced into thin chips

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Bake fish fillets and sweet potato for 20 minutes or until cooked. When almost ready, top three fish fillets with mozzarella and return to oven. Remove when cheese is melted.
To assemble, place spinach leaves, basil and tomatoes on each of the fillets with melted cheese. Top with tomato sauce then remaining fillets.
Wrap slider in baking paper. Serve with lemon wedge, sweet potato chips and green salad.
